attributes.action: The bank holidays should be arranged for a later date this year, after lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: I think it will boost morale, show fairness and it is the decent thing to do
attributes.background: Due to the lockdown, the UK has not had a proper bank holiday.  Easter and May bank holidays are all essentially during lockdown. The government should give the bank holiday at a later date for citizens to celebrate properly

rejection.details:
